original_text: So we labored at the work, and half of them held the spears from the break of dawn until the stars came out.
korean_text: 우리가 이같이 공사하는데 무리의 절반은 동틀 때부터 별이 나기까지 창을 잡았으며

sentences.original_text: So we labored at the work
and half of them held the spears
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들 중 절반은 창을 들고 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: from the break of dawn until the stars came out
